Release Version: ZMap 0.1.68
Release Date: 16 October 2009

(Last release was on 02/10/2009)

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved

ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapView/: zmapViewUtils.c, zmapView_P.h: add functions to get at featureset names from source names.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: make sure that we pass source lists to get_features code.
  • src/: zmapServer/zmapServer.c, zmapServer/zmapServer.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/zmapServerPrototype.h, zmapServer/das/dasServer.c, zmapServer/file/fileServer.c, include/ZMap/zmapServerProtocol.h: add source list to getFeatureSets call, need to fetch correct features.
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c: make sure we use source name to find features, not column name.
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_10_02.shtml: new zmap release notes for 2 October 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_10_02.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 02/10/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.8694/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • doc/Project_notes/Goals.shtml: fix title.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark.c: fix bug, mark coords wrong when revcomp.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: add field for feature total length to feature description.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureData.c: add feature total length resource, fix bugs in reporting sub part coords/type.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindowInfoPanel.c: fix all sorts of bugs in reporting of information.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix up bugs in reporting feature coords, cut buffer may still not be correct.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowUtils.c, zmapWindow_P.h: add call to handle revcomp of strand, needed for strand display to user.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowCanvasItem.c, zmapWindowCanvasItem.h: add function to get children of a canvas item.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c: if we remove the last feature in a column then hide the column.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerUtils.c: add comment clarification.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: fix feature delete code, needed to access current context, all the align/block etc copying was not correct, also add delete all features code.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w9/: blxview.c, blxparser.c: Added support for reversed match sequences
  • w9/blxview.c: Changed the display name for the match sequence so that it includes the strand direction
  • w9/blxview.c: Only display the Statistics dialog for developers
